GSP33bhbhg_cu:7511: yo bhaktyā māṃ bhajate tasyānugrahaṃ kartuṃ mama svabhāvaḥ yathāgniḥ samyag bhajamānasya śītādyapanodaṃ karoti netarasya /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7512: ato ye bhajanti tu bhaktyā sevante (mām) āśrayante teṣv ahaṃ varte /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7516: vṛttam apy atra tantram ity āha ---
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7518: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ // BhG_9.30 //)
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7520: suṣṭhu bhṛśaṃ1 ced durācāraḥ so 'pi sādhur eva mantavyaḥ /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7522: samyag vyavasitaḥ suniścitabuddhiḥ sanmārgam āsthito yataḥ /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7529: kaunteya pratijānīhi na madbhaktaḥ praṇaśyati // BhG_9.31 //)
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7536: idānīṃ ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā --- iti yad bhagavatsevanaṃ
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7537: prakrāntaṃ tatra śraddhābhaktibhyāṃ bhagavadvyapāśrayaṇaprarovanārtham apy arthavādam āha
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7538: (māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7539: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim // BhG_9.32 //)
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7541: he pārtha māṃ vyapāśritya viśeṣeṇa śaraṇatvenāśritya ye 'pi pāpayonayo bhavanti /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7542: pāpād yonir janma yeṣāṃ te pāpayonayaḥ kutsitajanmānaḥ stryādayo ye 'tyantam apavarge 'nadhikṛtās te 'pi
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7543: svakarmānuṣṭhānalakṣaṇena madājñāsampādanena pāpakṣayāt paramāṃ prakṛṣṭām uttamāṃ svargalakṣaṇāṃ gatiṃ yānti prāpnuvantīti sambhāvyate /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7544: matsamparko hi śu(ddhikāraṇam analasamparka iva lauhasya /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7546: svakarmaṇaivārādhanasya vidhānāt pratyutthānātmakaṃ karma śūdrasyāpi svabhāvajam iti pratyutthānena paricaryātmakena svakarmaṇā tam evārthasiddhiṃ vindati mānava iti /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7552: (kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7553: anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prapya bhajasva mām // BhG_9.33 //)
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7555: bhagavaccharaṇagatā anadhikṛtāḥ stryādayo 'py utkṛṣṭāṃ gatiṃ gacchanti /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7558: apiśabdena sambhāvanārthenātiśayoktyā brāhmaṇādīnāṃ jñānaprarocanānena kriyate na tu yathāśruto
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7560: yathā --- api parvataṃ śirasā bhindyāt api droṇapākaṃ
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7561: bhuñjīta --- ity anena vākyena puruṣaśaktiśraddhānaṃ kriyate na tu
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7563: na hi parvataṃ bhindyād ity asyānyaparatvāt svārthātātparyāt tatra pravṛttiḥ /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7564: na hi vidhivihitasyārthasya stutyā droṇapākasya pratiṣiddhasya duṣṭasya nindayā nivṛttiḥ /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7566: ataś ca jaiminir arthavādalakṣaṇasūtraṃ2 praṇītavān --- vidhinā tv ekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syur iti /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7567: arthavādāḥ kila vidhyekavākyatayā vidhiśeṣatvena niṣedhaśeṣatvena ca tatstutyarthās tannindārthā vā bhaveyur ity arthaḥ /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7572: arthe 'dhigantum iṣyeta kathaṃ syāt tasya satyatā // iti /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7573: tathā ca śrutau --- paśuyāge3 vapāhomaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7577: 1. saṃharaṇam āha 2. na hi parvaṃ ... danyaparapvāt svārthatātparyātra ... hi ... stutyā pratiṣiddhasya ... nivānti ... yavṛtti .... pra ca jaimiti ...
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7581: tasyāyam arthaḥ --- evaṃ nāma yajamānenāvaśyaṃ vapāhomaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7583: eva vāpam utkhidya vapāhomo 'nuṣṭhita iti paśuyāgavidher avaśyakartavyatve vapotkhananam adhyāropitaṃ prarocanārtham /
GSP33bhbhg_cu:7584: loke 'py anabhipretaduṣṭapuruṣagṛhabhojananivṛttyarthaṃ kaścid bravīti --- varaṃ viṣaṃ bhakṣya mā cāsya gṛhe bhuṅkthā iti anenāpi laukikenārthavādavākyena na viṣabhakṣaṇalakṣaṇaḥ2 svārtho vidhīyata api tu atiśayoktyā (ta)d gehabhojananivṛttiḥ kriyate /
